entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Salmon Arm
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Salmon Arm 06:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: NE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 3 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
